name: DRUG TEST
description:
This game has been made for Bevy Jam #3, but has not been finished on time :(
You can still play it tho :)

You are a test subject in an experimental drug testing facility, until you decide to run away. The facility is heavily guarded, so you will have to sneak past the security to gain your freedom. Good luck...

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow keys - walk
  • Left mouse button / Space - punch
  • 1, 2, 3 - consume a pill

In the facility you will find pills, which you can take to enhance your abilities. But every experimental drug has an unwanted side effect.

Pill types:

  • healing (red) - heals 15 HP
  • speed boost (yellow) - makes you go faster
  • toxic fart (green) - stuns enemies in a small radius around you
  • invisibility (light blue) - turns you invisible to enemies
  • invincibility (purple) - makes you invincible for short period of tim

Side effects:

  • ouch - you lose some health
  • speed debuff - makes you go slower
  • sneezing - alerts enemies around you of your position
  • dizziness - inverts your controls
  • vulnerability - you lose twice as much health when hit

We haven't managed to implement an actual ending, so you can pretend there's a "You win" screen when you reach the final room. This is more of a rough demo than a finished game, but we hope you enjoy it anyway :)

If you're interested you can check out a spritesheet animation library we made specifically for the jam here: https://github.com/BigNtertainment/bevy-spritesheet-animation We plan on finishing it and releasing it on crates.io now that the jam is over.
